name: Bad Omen (michaeltheang)
description:
Game summary

Bad Omens is a point-and-click adventure puzzle game inspired by Tiny Thief. 

In an Aztec civilization, players play as a young boy that must save his elder brother from the coming-of-age ceremony, which will irreversibly transform him into an adult.

Play through the game to discover and overcome the difficulties of growth and change.

Premise

When children come of age, they must enter the temple of Xolotl to take part in the “Coming of Age Ceremony”, where Xolotl will directly transform the children into adults.

Xipl the elder has now come of age and his younger brother, Catl, must stop the ceremony before the irreversible transformation takes place.

Catl must find his way through the temple and save his brother from Xolotl, the God of Death.

USP mechanic

2-character control

  • Player controls 2 characters, 1 of Catl, the younger brother, and 1 of Xipl, a solid construct of his elder brother. Players control them 1 at a time and each can do things that the other cannot. Both must be utilized to reach Catl’s goal.
  • Eg. 
    • Catl the younger can crawl through small spaces, and stand on fragile ground
    • Xipl the elder can climb over ledges and lift heavy objects

Hardware requirement: Android device

Download & install instruction:

  1. Click on Download
  2. When download has completed, allow app permission to install
  3. Open app
  4. Game will start momentarily

*WARNING: 

This game was not optimized for all devices, some players may experience characters moving strangely. As such, a skip room button was added in case this glitch becomes a game-breaking issue in certain scenarios.
